metadata.title: PM Shehbaz meets President Zardari at GovernorÃ¢ÂÂs House

content.article_body: LAHORE, Jun 01 (APP):Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif met President Asif Ali Zardari at Governoras House Lahore on Sunday to discuss the prevailing political and security situation of the country. During the meeting, the leadership held wide-ranging discussions on national affairs, including the countryas political climate and security challenges. The participants also reviewed the outcomes of the prime ministeras recent visits to friendly nations and their significance for Pakistanas foreign relations. The discussion also touched upon coordination and cooperation among political allies, emphasising the importance of unity in the current political landscape. President Zardari, highlighting the importance of public welfare, urged the government to take practical and impactful steps in the upcoming budget to provide relief to the common man. aThe government must take measures in the upcoming budget to provide relief to the common man,a President Zardari stressed. He further emphasised the need for unity among coalition partners, stating: aPolitical allies need to move forward together in the national interest.a The meeting was also attended by Speaker National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq, Interior Minister Mohsin Naqvi, Governor Punjab Sardar Saleem Haider Khan, and Senator Saleem Mandviwalla.
